fields.description: This field concatenates the text "Filing Date" with the Date of Filing field to display as one field. This is used by the OAH Filing Party Info related list on the OAH Docket Sheet Docket Sheet Layout.
fields.formula: "Filing Date " & TEXT( MONTH( Date_of_Filing__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY( Date_of_Filing__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR( Date_of_Filing__c ) )
fields.label: Filing Date
